appeal.name: First appeal under RTI Act (non-response/unsatisfactory reply)
appeal.template:
To,
The First Appellate Authority (FAA),
{department_name}, {office_address}

Subject: First Appeal under RTI Act, 2005

Sir/Madam,

I had filed an RTI application dated {rti_date} (Ref: {rti_reference}) seeking information regarding {topic}. I have not received any response within the statutory period / received an incomplete reply.

Grounds for appeal:
1) Failure to provide information within time.
2) Information provided is incomplete/incorrect (as applicable).

Relief sought:
1) Direct the PIO to provide complete information free of cost.
2) Take appropriate action as per RTI Act for delay/denial.

Yours faithfully,
{applicant_name}
{phone}
{email}
{date}
notes: Attach copy of RTI application and proof of submission.
